trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand" />, and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand" /> events of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand" /> e <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> event is raised when the `Cancel` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> é gerado quando o `Cancel` botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> event is raised when the `Delete` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> é gerado quando o `Delete` botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand> event is raised when the `Edit` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand> é gerado quando o `Edit` botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand> event is raised when any button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand> evento é gerado quando qualquer botão de um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically test for when a specific command button is clicked and take appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você teste para quando um botão de comando específico é clicado e tomar as devidas providências programaticamente.

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to handle custom command buttons for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é geralmente usado para lidar com os botões de comando personalizado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand> event is raised when the `Update` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand> é gerado quando o `Update` botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs>, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to define event handlers for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> events of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como definir manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> eventos de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle.

trans-unit.source: This example specifies the event handlers declaratively, setting the event handler for each command property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo especifica os manipuladores de eventos declarativamente, definir o manipulador de eventos para cada propriedade do comando do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to specify the event handlers and programmatically add them to the events in the `Page_Load` method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como especificar os manipuladores de eventos e programaticamente adicioná-los para os eventos de `Page_Load` método.

trans-unit.source: The selected item from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" />.
trans-unit.target: O item selecionado na <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" />.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: A origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> that contains the original event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> que contém os dados de evento originais.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs> classe.

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs> é criado por uma chamada para o construtor, as seguintes propriedades são inicializadas com os valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: Valor inicial

trans-unit.source: Item
trans-unit.target: Item

trans-unit.source: The value of the `item` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `item` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: CommandSource
trans-unit.target: CommandSource

trans-unit.source: The value of the `commandSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `commandSource` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a fonte do comando.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: A origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property to determine the command source that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> propriedade para determinar a origem de comando que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to determine which command raises the event.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade normalmente é usada para determinar qual comando gera o evento.

trans-unit.source: You can then take appropriate action, based on the command.
trans-unit.target: Você poderá então agir apropriado, com base no comando.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property to determine the command selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> para determinar o comando selecionado pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: It then performs the appropriate action based, on the command.
trans-unit.target: Ele executa a ação apropriada com base no comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets the item containing the command source in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item que contém a fonte do comando no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> object that represents the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> que representa o item selecionado no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.Item%2A> property to access information about the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.Item%2A> propriedade para acessar informações sobre o item selecionado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.Item%2A> property to display information about the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.Item%2A> propriedade para exibir informações sobre o item selecionado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controle.
